pageTitle: Cropping vs. moving closer vs. changing focal length: Nikon DX SLR (D40-D90, D3000-D7100) Talk Forum: Digital Photography Review
textBeforeTable: Flat view Next unread Next Previous First Parent Forum Complain Reply to thread   Reply with quote   Which of the three will be of the best quality and which will be of the lowest quality? 3) the photographer moves closer and shoots it at 135 mm & 8 MP, standing at a distance such that the field of vision will be precisely the same as #1 & #2. 2) standing in the same position as photo #1, the photographer shoots the photo at 200 mm at 8 MP such that the field of vision is precisely the same as the now cropped first photo.
